episode: I was stuck at the airport and a friend of mine forgot to pick me up, stranding me. So I called a family member and they took time off from their work to come and pick me up, I was extremely grateful for their sacrifice.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was stuck at the airport for several hours as my friend that I had told weeks in advance to pick me up, had bailed and forgotten to pick me up.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's so frustrating! What a terrible friend.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, they are no longer a close friend of mine and I was very upset with them for forgetting about me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I don't blame you, that's a pretty big betrayal of trust.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: However, I called a family member of mine in the area and they were willing to take the day off from their important work meeting to come and pick me up.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's amazing, so sweet of them!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was sweet, and I was extremely grateful for their sacrifice as I had known they were not initially available to come pick me up, due to their work responsibilities on that day.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: They really came through for you, that's wonderful!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I felt a little bad making them come pick me up, but I wouldn't have asked if I wasn't in such a hurry.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sure they didn't mind, they wanted to help.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I missed an important meeting as well, so I felt infuriated with my friend. But I at least was able to get a ride from my sibling to get to my work eventually.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Glad your sibling saved the day, but yeah, missing that meeting must've been infuriating!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, it all ended in a mess for everyone, but my sibling proved how much they cared for me and we now laugh at it looking back.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Nice that you can laugh about it now, and it brought you closer to your sibling!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My "friend" however let me down big time and I no longer consider them as close as I used to. They couldn't have let me down more for such a simple task.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yeah, that's a tough one to forgive, especially when it was such a simple thing to follow through on.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: But while it was stressful at the time, I am now grateful for my sibling's empathy and accommodation.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's the silver lining, your sibling's kindness really shone through.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Well, that sums up why I was so grateful, thank you for listening and for the positive feedback.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're welcome, glad I could listen and help you reflect on the good that came out of it.
